==Applies To==
* iOS applications that use location data.
==What to Do==
Do not log location data.
==Why==
Logging location data is likely to raise privacy concerns among users.
==How==
If your application uses location data, do not store it in files and do not send it to remote servers.
==Privacy Guidelines== * [[00000000-0000-0000-0000-0000001a0c7b|Do Not Cache Sensitive Data]] * [[00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000930b93|Do Not Log Location Data]] * [[00000000-0000-0000-0000-00000033f0db|Do Not Log Sensitive Data]]
==Privacy Checklists== * [[00000000-0000-0000-0000-0000008cb7d6|Sensitive Data Is Not Cached]] * [[00000000-0000-0000-0000-0000007e16f2|Location Data Is Not Logged]] * [[00000000-0000-0000-0000-00000058bf53|Sensitive Data Is Not Logged]]
